title: Add a new third page with love-themed pictures (teddy, flowers, chocolates, ring) and update navigation flow

requirements.text: Reintroduce a 3-step in-app flow by adding a new third step after the Love Letter step, and update the app navigation so the steps are: Intro -> Love Letter -> Love-Themed Pictures page.

quotes: Make another third page where put some love theme pictures like teddy and some flowers and chocolates and ring

acceptanceCriteria: From the Intro page, the primary button navigates to the Love Letter page.
From the Love Letter page, the bottom button navigates to the new third page (not back to Intro).
The app compiles with no unused-step import errors and no references to the removed Memories flow in the running app.

requirements.text: Create a new third step component (a new page/step under the existing Valentine steps) that displays a love-themed picture gallery featuring: teddy, flowers, chocolates, and a ring. Use English user-facing text for any headings, captions, and buttons.

quotes: Make another third page where put some love theme pictures like teddy and some flowers and chocolates and ring

acceptanceCriteria: The third page renders a visually coherent gallery/grid of 4 love-themed images (teddy, flowers, chocolates, ring).
All visible labels/headings on the third page are in English.
Images load from static assets (not from the backend).

requirements.text: Add an end-of-flow action on the new third page: include a clear button that returns the user to the Intro step (start of the flow), using English user-facing text.

quotes: Make another third page where put some love theme pictures like teddy and some flowers and chocolates and ring

acceptanceCriteria: The third page includes a prominent button (English text) that returns to the Intro step when clicked.
After returning to Intro, the user can proceed through the flow again without needing a refresh.

requirements.text: Add the required love-themed images as generated static assets and render them on the new third page from `/assets/generated/*` paths.

quotes: put some love theme pictures like teddy and some flowers and chocolates and ring

acceptanceCriteria: All required images exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames specified in this build request.
The third page references the images by those exact filenames and renders all of them.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not add new backend services or databases; keep the backend as the existing single Motoko actor (no backend changes required for this request).
All user-facing text introduced or changed by this request must be English.
nonGoals: Do not restore the old Memories photo-upload gallery behavior or its error-handling gallery logic unless explicitly requested.
Do not add authentication changes (Internet Identity) or any new backend APIs for this feature.
Do not implement real-time features (e.g., chat/websockets) or third-party integrations.

required: Cute teddy bear with hearts, romantic illustration (teddy-love.dim_800x800.png)
Bouquet of flowers in a romantic style, illustration (flowers-bouquet.dim_800x800.png)
Assorted chocolates gift box, romantic illustration (chocolates-gift.dim_800x800.png)
Engagement ring with sparkle highlights, romantic illustration (ring-sparkle.dim_800x800.png)
